message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I believe I can find something similar within my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $100?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, would you be open to selling the product for $100? This aligns closely with what I am prepared to spend.

I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $105. It's a small increase, but I think it's worth it for the value you'll get from the product.

Hello Alice, I'm glad we could come closer to an agreement. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $100. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to complete the transaction.
